topic.title: edited site with problems
topic.body:
edited site with problems

http://127.0.0.1:43110/18nQPR4TCM4tQ8L7fm6dX6SGXLsj7wa8sv

people began to enter and leave the chat lines, files started doing his thing and larger data base.

I created the site. by a bug in the code chat site I delete it completely.

I upload the site again.

that's where things appear in the first place. data first version of the site.

I thought that must be respected a full erase. and peer obey the order of that completely erased and not mix old data with the new site.

topic.body:
